document.full_text: the army of northern sudan is now helping nomadic people, who have a long history of being used as proxy forces by the government, into abyei, according to a united nations report.
document.title: u.n. warns of ethnic cleansing in sudan town
lines_and_colors: the army of northern sudan is now helping nomadic people, who have a long history of being used as proxy forces by the government, into abyei, according to a united nations report.
